feels.name: Regret
feels.quote: The loss of her daughter made Mrs. Bennet very dull for several days.

feels.name: Pride
feels.quote: He is as fine a fellow as ever I saw. He simpers, and smirks, and makes love to us all. I am prodigiously proud of him.

feels.name: Regret
feels.quote: I begin to be sorry that he comes at all.

feels.name: Regret
feels.quote: The loss of her daughter made Mrs. Bennet very dull for several days.

feels.name: Excitement
feels.quote: The housekeeper at Netherfield had received orders to prepare for the arrival of her master, who was coming down in a day or two, to shoot there for several weeks.

feels.name: Distress
feels.quote: I begin to be sorry that he comes at all.

feels.name: Confusion
feels.quote: I saw you look at me to-day, Lizzy, when my aunt told us of the present report; and I know I appeared distressed; but donâ€™t imagine it was from any silly cause.
